about_the_game:
In Bullets & Brains: Demo, you'll get a taste of the sprawling post-apocalyptic environment, teeming with engaging atmosphere and danger at every turn. As one of the last survivors, it's up to you to navigate through the desolate streets, abandoned buildings, grimy alleyways, but also forests, sewers and even snowy mountains, fighting off waves of relentless zombies.

But fear not, for you possess a powerful advantage. Collect brains and energy and keep on leveling up! These items will boost your character's abilities, enabling you to unleash devastating attacks and turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Are you afraid of fighting alone? Group up with another survivor and do everything you can to keep each other alive! The more the merrier, right? Co-op Mode is all you need to have even more fun while battling against hordes of zombies.

The game supports both mouse and keyboard as well as gamepad, allowing you to play the way you like best. Feel the precision as you aim down sights or go for a more dynamic and fast-paced experience.

Are you ready to face the hordes of brain-hungry zombies in the chaotic post-apocalyptic landscape? Grab your weapons, brace yourself, and embark on the ultimate battle for survival in Bullets and Brains. The fate of humanity rests in your hands.

● The Demo offers a choice of two characters. Check out the full version for loads of distinctive characters, each with their own starting weapon.

● Explore a sprawling post-apocalyptic environment, filled with atmospheric locations and hidden secrets.

● Engage in intense top-down 3D shooter combat against never-ending hordes of brain-hungry zombies.

● Group with last survivors to protect each other in mayhem battles - Bullets
and Brains offers a co-op mode!

● Collect brains in order to level up and energy that grants powerful abilities, allowing you to unleash devastating attacks.

● Experience the game with your preferred control scheme, supporting both mouse and keyboard as well as gamepad.

● Test your survival skills against endless waves of undead

● Enjoy the fast-paced action and dynamic gameplay that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

● Unleash your strategic thinking and skillful aim to overcome the relentless zombie onslaught.

This is a demo version! Wishlist the full game to get updated when it's released with even more content, characters, weapons and levels!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 CPU / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1030 / Radeon RX 550

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / AMD Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580

short_description: Bullets & Brains is an adrenaline-pumping arcade top-down 3D shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by brain-hungry hordes of zombies. Prepare yourself for an intense battle against the never-ending onslaught of the undead.
